Detailed Description

A concrete kernel class.

see Monaghan & Lattanzio (1985) most often used kernel implemented in bskernel.cpp

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

  • initialize the auxiliary factors

  • normalize to 1.0

Member Function Documentation

Vec2d BetaSpline::gradW ( double  distance,
const Vec2d &  distanceVector 
) const [virtual]

Calculates the kernel derivation for the given distance of two particles.

We take this from Monaghan & Lattenzio (1985) but used a doubled smoothing length for the definition of the interaction radius.

Implements Kernel.

double BetaSpline::w ( double  distance  )  const [virtual]

Calculates the kernel value for the given distance of two particles.

We take this from Monaghan & Lattenzio (1985) but used a doubled smoothing length for the definition of the interaction radius.

Implements Kernel.
